Job Title: Software Engineer II - Android Development - Java/ C++
Job Description: Candidate Profile:- 3+ years professional programming in an object oriented language such as JavaC++.- 3+ years work experience in developing applications on a mobile platform.- B.Tech from Premier Institutes. (IIT- s, REC- s, BITS, etc preferred)Job Description:- Mobile Engineer is an integral member of the engineering team responsible for developing innovative mobile solutions.- Responsible for the design and development of enterprise mobile applications for iPhone, Android OS, BlackBerry and others.- Work with internal business teams and product management to define requirements and develop technical specifications.Skills Required:- Hands on experience in developing applications for iPhone, Blackberry, J2ME, or Android.- Strong technical and design skills and the ability to learn new technologies quickly.- Understanding of XMLJSON based RESTful API.
